intro: Diandranthus tibeticus, commonly known as the Tibetan diandranthus, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of the Tibetan Plateau. The plant typically grows in rocky and arid environments, showcasing adaptations to extreme climatic conditions. Diandranthus tibeticus is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological significance in alpine ecosystems.
